data.benefits: Scheme provides 50% financial assistance on project cost upto maximum of Rs.5000 lakhs for setting up electronic waste management and e-waste recovery projects.
data.eligibility: All units operating in Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) sector anywhere in the Haryana State are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit shall file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. Operations in Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) sector anywhere in the State of Haryana. 
  3. The unit should have obtained NOC/Change of Land Use (CLU) from Competent Authority if applicable. 
  4. The unit should be in commercial production. 
  5. The unit should be in regular production at the time of disbursement and the subsidy shall not be released to a closed unit.
data.beneficiaries: All units operating in Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) sector anywhere in the Haryana State are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit shall file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. Operations in Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) sector anywhere in the State of Haryana. 
  3. The unit should have obtained NOC/Change of Land Use (CLU) from Competent Authority if applicable. 
  4. The unit should be in commercial production. 
  5. The unit should be in regular production at the time of disbursement and the subsidy shall not be released to a closed unit.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: In pursuance to the provision under Chapter 14 of the Haryana Enterprises & Employment Policy-2020 notified in Gazette vide No. 25/05/2020-4IB-I dated 29.12.2020, the Governor of Haryana is notified the Scheme of “Assistance for Waste Management Scheme”
data.objective: To incentivize industries for carrying out the waste management activities (collection, transportation, treatment, and disposal) in a manner, which is not just environmentally, socially, and financially sustainable but is also economically viable.
data.description: Scheme provides 50% financial assistance on project cost upto maximum of Rs.5000 lakhs for setting up electronic waste management and e-waste recovery projects.
data.how_to_apply:
Application in the prescribed Form for the assistance, along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ Director General, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal of the department. 

Annexure-I : https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060230.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism:
The grant will be released in 3 installments: 

  • First Tranche : 25% will be released after 100% land possession and 50% expenditure of eligible project cost. 
  • Second Tranche : 25% will be released after 75% expenditure of eligible project cost. 
  • Third/Final Tranche :50% will be released after 100% expenditure of eligible project cost.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
